entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Did you really act so childish as to remove your Noble Prize post? You are losing your mind. Resign and save us more humiliation. If it was sarcasm you would not have deleted it. This is just like the covid-19 press conferences you are not doing daily now because of your sarcasm.
